players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Oh no, Bob is dead! This is terrible. We need to figure out who the mafia is."
Diana: "I'm shocked that Bob is dead. Let's all share our suspicions and discuss who might be the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. My investigation confirms it. Diana, we must vote together to eliminate her and win this for the town."
You: "I am the detective! I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Diana, do not believe his lies. He is trying to frame me to save himself."
